trait.name: Incomparable Hunter
entries: When Algoran hits an enemy with a melee attack, he doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from that enemy for the rest of his turn.

trait.name: Tough Skin
entries: While Algoran is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Constitution modifier.

trait.name: Primal Mind
entries: Algoran has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Flesh Hunter's Rage
entries: As a bonus action, Algoran can enter a rage at the start of its turn. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until Algoran is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, Algoran gains the following benefits:
Algoran has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
When Algoran makes a melee weapon attack, he gains a +4 bonus to the damage roll.
Algoran has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, Algoran can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Rotting Strike
entries: Once per turn, if Algoran makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Algoran makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: +1 Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) slashing damage, or 13 ({@damage 1d6 + 10}) slashing damage while raging.

action.name: Lightwood Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage, or 14 ({@dice 1d10} + 9) slashing damage while raging.

action.name: Whirlwind Strike {@recharge 5}
entries: Algoran makes a melee attack against any number of creatures within its reach, with a separate attack roll for each target.

reaction.name: Unbroken Spirit
entries: When Algoran succeeds on a Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throw, he and one allied creature of his choice within 10 feet of him gains 10 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Primal Mind
entries: The savage has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the savage can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: The tulgar savage carries a primal greataxe.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The savage makes two attacks with its greataxe.

action.name: Primal Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The shaman is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The shaman has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Primal Mind
entries: The savage has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit ({@hit 6} to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

action.name: Primal Savagery (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) acid damage.

action.name: Cure Wounds (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: The shaman touches a creature of its choice and it regains 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) hit points. If the shaman casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

action.name: Blight (5th-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: The shaman chooses a creature that it can see within 30 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
If the shaman targets a plant creature or a magical plant, it makes the saving throw with disadvantage, and the spell deals maximum damage to it.

monster.name: Kraul Warrior
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

trait.name: Hive Mind
entries: The kraul is immune to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
Kraul society is organized into well-defined roles and castes. The vast majority of the kraul occupy various tiers of soldiery, from commanders and elite troops down to the lowliest infantry.

entries.name: Kraul
entries: The kraul are an ascendant power group within the Golgari Swarm, long content to linger at the margins of the undercity but now increasingly making their buzzing voices heard in the subterranean Golgari guildhall. These six-legged, insectile beings are hard-headed and literal-minded, with little grasp of metaphor or nuance.

spellcasting.name: Innate spellcasting
headerEntries: Kolasiah's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creture that touches Kolasiah or hits her with a melee attack while within 5 feet of her takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Hellish Claws
entries: Kolasiah's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage on a hit (included in the attacks).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Kolasiah has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Statues of Molten Rock
entries: Creatures {@condition petrified} by Kolasiah are immune to fire damage while {@condition petrified}. Whenever a creature {@condition petrified} by Kolasiah is touched by another creature, the touching creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: During the first round of combat, Kolasiah has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that is surprised and it deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage each time it hits such a creature with an attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kolasiah makes two claw attacks. She can also use Petryifing Gaze or after making these attacks.

action.name: Fiery Claw
entries: Mellee Weapon Attack. {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage. Instead of dealing damage, Kolasiah can grapple the darget (escape {@dc 17})

action.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: The medusa fixes her gaze on one creature within 60 feet of her that she can see and that can see her eyes. The target must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly {@condition petrified}. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of tis next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification last until the creature is freed by a greater restoration spell or similar magic.

action.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Scorching Ray (2nd-Level Spell; 3/Day)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120 ft., three rays.; one target pre ray. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage per ray.

reaction.name: Hellish Rebuke (5th-Level Spell; 3/Day)
entries: When Kolasiah is damaged by a creature within 60 feet of her that she can see, she can force the creature to make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a succesful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Suniel's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, Suniel has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Suniel is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Suniel deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Suniel that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Suniel has advantange on saving throws agains being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Suniel has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Suniel makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Trained in the use of poison, assassins are remorseless killers who work for nobles, guildmasters, sovereigns, and anyone else who can afford them.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Carol is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). Carol has the following artificer spell prepared:

trait.name: Master of War Machines
entries: Carol has advantage on ability checks made to repair any infernal war machine.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Carol wears a pair of {@item goggles of night} and has a {@item bag of holding}. She is attuned to a {@item mask of ventilation|warlordsofavernus} and has a hand crossbow with the {@optfeature repeating shot|TCE} artificer infusion.

trait.name: Alchemical Savant
entries: When Carol casts a spell that restores hit points or deals acid, fire or necrotic damage, she gains a +5 bonus to one roll of the spell. That roll must restore hit points or be a damage roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Carol uses either the Acid-Melting Bomb or the Styx Gas Poison, if available. She then makes one attack with her repeating hand crossbow.

action.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) fire damage.

action.name: Acid-Melting Bomb (3/Day)
entries: Carol throws an acid-filled flask at a point she can see within 25 feet of her. The flask bursts on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the impact must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage on a failed save, and half as much on a succesful one.

action.name: Styx Gas Poison (3/Day)
entries: Carol throws a gas-filled flask at a point she can see within 25 feet of her. The flask bursts on impact, leaving a static cloud of poisonous gas. When a creature enters the cloud's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, that creature is targeted by a {@spell feeblemind} spell (save {@dc 16}). The cloud lasts for 1 minute, or until a strong wind disperses it.

If a creature fails its saving throw and remains under the poison's effect for 30 consecutive days, the effect becomes permanent (no save) and the creature loses all its memories, becoming a near-mindless shell of its former self. At that point, nothing short of a wish spell or divine intervention can undo the effect.

action.name: Repeating Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} +6 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. The crossbow produces its own ammunition automatically, creating one piece of magic ammunition when Carol makes a ranged attack with it. This is a magic weapon attack.

reaction.name: Flash of Genius (5/Day)
entries: When Carol or another creature she can see within 30 feet of her makes an ability check or a saving throw, she can add her Intelligence modifier as a bonus to the roll.

monster.name: Carol D'Vown's Helmed Horror

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: Common and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The helmed horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spell Immunity
entries: The helmed horror is immune to the following spells: {@spell fireball}, {@spell heat metal}, and {@spell hold monster}.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: The helmed horror wields {@item metalbreaker|warlordsofavernus}, that grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it (included in its attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The helmed horror makes two longsword attacks.

action.name: Metalbreaker
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands. If it hits an object made of metal, the hit is automatically a critical hit.

This construct possesses intelligence, the ability to reason and adjust its tactics, and an unswerving devotion to its maker that persists even after its maker's demise. Resembling an animated suit of empty plate armor, a helmed horror serves without ambition or emotion.

entries.name: Magical Purpose
entries: Though it takes more magical resources to create a helmed horror than a lesser suit of animated armor, the helmed horror requires less direction and maintenance as it carries out its appointed tasks. A helmed horror follows its orders with complete loyalty, and is intelligent enough to understand the difference between an order's intent and its exact wording. Unlike many constructs, it seeks to fulfill the former rather than slavishly follow the latter.

entries.name: Tactical Cunning
entries: A helmed horror fights with the cunning of a skilled warrior, taking to the air as it attacks weaker characters and spellcasters first. However, a helmed horror lacks the insight to change its environment, fortify it, or otherwise take active measures to improve its defensive position.

entries.name: Constructed Nature
entries: A helmed horror doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Lilxori's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Fiendish Blessing
entries: The AC of Lilxori includes its Charisma bonus.

trait.name: Ferocious Surge (Recharges after a short or long rest)
entries: When Lilxori hits an attack that isn't a critical hit, she can turn the hit into a critical hit.

trait.name: Fury of the Nine
entries: As a bonus action, Lilxori chooses another creature that can see or hear her within 120 feet. That creature gains advantage on all attack rolls and saving throws for the next minute or until Lilxori uses this ability again.

trait.name: Infernal Tactics
entries: Immediately after rolling initiative, Lilxori can chose herself and up to three allies she can see if she isn't {@condition incapacitated}. Lilxori can swap the initiative results of the chosen creatures among them.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lilxori makes two melee attacks or uses her Fire Ray twice.

action.name: Hellfire Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage and the target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 6d6} poison damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Fire Ray
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120ft., one target. {@h}({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Zariel's Command (Recharges 4-6)
entries: Up to three allied devils within 120 feet of Lilxori that can hear her can use their reaction to each make one weapon attack.

reaction.name: Hellish Rebuke
entries: When Lilxori is damaged by a creature within 60 feet. of her that she can see, she can force the creature to make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

monster.name: Infernal Homunculus

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

languages: Common and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Infernal Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the homunculus' darkvision.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the homunculus is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the homunculus instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as Carol D'Vown, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communcate telepathically.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1  piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instead poisoned for 5 ({@dice 1d10}) minutes and unconscious while poisoned in this way.

action.name: Force Strike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) force damage.

item.name: Lightwood Pike
entries: This magical wooden pike was crafted with a lightweight, but durable wood. It lacks the two-handed property.

item.name: Primal Greataxe
entries: This greataxe is imbued with the power of primal spirits of Elemental Earth, enhancing the endurance of its wielder.
While attuned to it, you gain a +1 bonus to Constitution saving throws.

item.name: Mask of Ventilation
entries: While wearing this mask, you have advantage on saving throws against harmful gases such as those created by a {@spell cloudkill} spell, a {@spell stinking cloud} spell, inhaled poisons and gaseous breath weapons.

item.name: Metalbreaker
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls you make with this magic weapon. If it hits an object made of metal the hit is automatically a critical hit, and it can deal bludgeoning or slashing damage to the object (your choice). Further, damage from nonmagical sources can't harm the weapon.
